title: Inception
description: A thief who enters dreams to steal secrets must plant an idea into a target's subconscious.

title: Interstellar
description: A group of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to save humanity.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wants to plunge Gotham into chaos.

title: Titanic
description: A wealthy woman and a poor artist fall in love aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.

title: The Notebook
description: A love story about a young couple who fall deeply in love one summer.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: Earth's mightiest heroes assemble once more to undo the damage caused by Thanos.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators help a family terrorized by a dark presence.

title: Insidious
description: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child.

title: The Lion King
description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after the death of his father.

title: Frozen
description: Two sisters navigate love, friendship, and magical ice powers to save their kingdom.
